Text:
Frankie....
It's not actually British, because Columbia Pictures produced it and it was made in it's USA studios.
However, the history of the film happens in England, some actors are british and the filme really has a british atmosphere.

I can't believe you've  uploaded this treasure! I watched this years and years ago when I was very young (with a Mum who's a movie buff) and loved it. Been searching for it ever since. How come the good one's aren't on tv?

Thank you, thank you, thank you. You've made my day! xx
Please, please, please keep seeding. Thank you.

A terrific film noir, with stand-out performances by Nina Foch and George Macready -- and especially Dame May Whitty, playing wickedly against type. A respectable transfer, too. Thanks for the upload!
